ValidationError.name: ValidationError
ValidationError.Message: The parameters passed to the API call are invalid, parameters that caused the problem are "{parameters}"

AuthorizationFailed.name: AuthorizationFailed
AuthorizationFailed.Message: The provided Access Key Or Secret Key is invalid

APILimitReached.name: APILimitReached
APILimitReached.Message: You have reached your allowed API Call limit of {limit} calls/hour

InvitationAlreadyAccepted.name: InvitationAlreadyAccepted
InvitationAlreadyAccepted.Message: User has already accepted the invitation

ForgotPasswordLinkExpired.name: ForgotPasswordLinkExpired
ForgotPasswordLinkExpired.Message: Your forgot password link has expired, please try requesting new link again

GeneralError.name: GeneralError
GeneralError.Message: I'm sorry, something went wrong on our end. If it happens again send us feedback and we will get back to you asap.

SMTPFatalError450.name: InvalidRecipient
SMTPFatalError450.Message: The Recipient's mailbox is unavailable. The mailbox has been corrupted or placed on an offline server, or your email hasn't been accepted for IP problems or blacklisting.

SMTPFatalError451.name: ServerMisconfiguration
SMTPFatalError451.Message: There is a configration error with our servers. Please try agian later

SMTPFatalError452.name: TooManyRecipient
SMTPFatalError452.Message: Recipients are more than 50 including To, Cc, Bcc

SMTPFatalError551.name: SpamMail
SMTPFatalError551.Message: Classified as Spam Mail. Please contact your ISP to send mail.

SMTPFatalError554.name: TransactionFailed
SMTPFatalError554.Message: Transaction Failed. Your IP may be blacklisted by server.

SubscriptionTrialExpired.name: SubscriptionTrialExpired
SubscriptionTrialExpired.Message: Your days trial period has been expired.

Migrating.name: Migrating
Migrating.Message: New features are coming, your salesmate will be live very soon.

message_failed_on_invalid_number.name: MessageFailedOnInvalidNumber
message_failed_on_invalid_number.Message: 'To' number is not a valid mobile number

UnderMaintenance.name: UnderMaintenance
UnderMaintenance.Message: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary maintenance of the server.

PartialUpdate.name: PartialUpdate
PartialUpdate.Message: Your request to update the records is partially done. Check fields you are updating and try again.

PartialDelete.name: PartialDelete
PartialDelete.Message: Your request to delete the records is partially done. Check records you are updating and try again.
